Reviews.Content: comfortable family double bed bunk beds separated curtain spacious bathroom nice breakfast fresh fruit lots hams 7 cheese pastry satisfied machine coffees drinks nice staff polite ready assist wifi excellent location short walking distance city centre plaza catalunya distances hotel taxi station
